content: this legal text summarizes the division of a property between two parties referred to as mrs mc and mr bc the property is a building located in municipality castelfidardo consisting of a ground floor apartment a basement apartment and a garage on the first basement floor mrs mc is attributed the first share of the property which includes full ownership of the ground floor apartment and the right to use the garage the value of this share is euro 10326250 mr bc is attributed the second share of the property which includes full ownership of the basement and firstfloor apartment as well as the bare ownership of the garage the value of this share is euro 18083750 both parties agreed upon the division of the property which is documented in a notarys office the document includes details of the property such as cadastral data and boundaries the summary mentions a sale but the specific details of the sale are not provided
